net.xuset.objectIO.markupMsg

Interface MsgParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsciiMsgParser

    public interface MsgParser
    Interface that outlines the operations necessary to convert a MarkupMsg object to a raw form and back again. This is mainly used when a message needs to be read or written to a I/O stream.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MarkupMsg parseFrom(byte[] rawInput)
      Takes a byte array and converts it into a MarkupMsg object.
      MarkupMsg parseFrom(char[] rawInput)
      Takes a character array and converts it into a MarkupMsg object.
      MarkupMsg parseFrom(java.lang.String rawInput)
      Takes a string and converts it into a MarkupMsg object.
      byte[] toRawByteArray(MarkupMsg msg)
      Converts a MarkupMsg object into a byte array that can be converted back by calling parseFrom.
      char[] toRawCharArray(MarkupMsg msg)
      Converts a MarkupMsg object into a character array that can be converted back by calling parseFrom.
      java.lang.String toRawString(MarkupMsg msg)
      Converts a MarkupMsg object into a string that can be converted back by calling parseFrom.

      • parseFrom

        MarkupMsg parseFrom(java.lang.String rawInput)
                    throws InvalidFormatException
        Takes a string and converts it into a MarkupMsg object.
        Parameters:
        rawInput - the raw form of a MarkupMsg object
        Returns:
        the newly created MarkupMsg object
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - if the parser was unable to create the message.

      • toRawString

        java.lang.String toRawString(MarkupMsg msg)
        Converts a MarkupMsg object into a string that can be converted back by calling parseFrom.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to convert into a raw form
        Returns:
        the raw form of the message

        Returns:
        the raw form of the message
